name: Fireplace Cozy International Beauty Selfie
description: Cozy POV selfie with international beauties in a warm fireplace-lit room

visual_core.description: A warm, dimly lit American country villa living room. The only strong light source is a roaring fireplace, casting flickering golden shadows. The shot is a cozy selfie-POV, held by the subject. A {character_description}, wearing a comfortable silk robe, lies lazily on a plush sofa, backlit by the fire. {pronoun_subject} looks directly into the lens with a playful and charming smile, then slowly sits up, the camera moving smoothly with {pronoun_object}.
visual_core.style: cinematic, cozy, warm color palette, low-light, charming, high-detail, realistic skin texture
visual_core.camera: selfie-POV, handheld, smooth motion, starts low (on sofa), rises with subject
visual_core.lighting: fireplace glow, golden shadows, warm backlighting

timeline.action: {character} lies on sofa, looking at camera with charming smile
timeline.camera: static selfie angle, slight handheld movement

timeline.action: {character} slowly sits up while maintaining eye contact
timeline.camera: smooth upward motion following the subject

audio.ambience: roaring fireplace, soft crackling, cozy room tone
